meanings.definition: The quality of being immediate or without delay.
meanings.sent1: The immediateness of his response impressed everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the immediateness of your actions in handling the situation.
meanings.sent3: The cat's demand for food showed an amusing immediateness.
meanings.sent4: The immediateness of the storm's arrival caught us off guard.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's immediateness in addressing the issue left a lasting impression on the students.

meanings.definition: The state of being present or existing at the current moment.
meanings.sent1: The immediateness of the music performance made it feel like we were there.
meanings.sent2: I love the immediateness of live broadcasts during important events.
meanings.sent3: The immediateness of the cake disappearing at the party was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The immediateness of the colors in the painting brought it to life.
meanings.sent5: The immediateness of the news update made everyone stop and listen.
